alert.note: Alert for Clay; Dickinson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 24 at 12:30AM CDT until October 24 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Dickinson County in northwestern Iowa... Northeastern Clay County in northwestern Iowa... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1229 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Terril, or 11 miles southwest of Estherville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Dickinson and northeastern Clay Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
